data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Aguirre-Peñafiel, Vanessa, Torres-Carvajal, Omar, Sales Nunes, Pedro M., Peck, Mika R., Maddock, Simon T. (2014): A new species of Riama Gray, 1858 (Squamata: Gymnophthalmidae) from the Tropical Andes. Zootaxa 3866 (2): 246-260, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3866.2.4
